review.reviewBody: the X-Large Hawaiian Pizza is soooo good. with balsamic vinegar. you cant go wrong. i inhaled half the pizza in less then 10 minutes

Never had a trouble before but I ordered the promotion (bogo promo code) buy 1 get 1 for free in a Medium Pepperoni Pizza with the dipping sauce. And I just got 1 single pizza. Which looks regular small like the others I have ordered before. I paid 30$ buck in total for a single pizza. And no it was not the delivery cost, due to after 15$ transaction the delivery is free based on the app policy. So disappointed I'd like to get my refund!

that will be my last order, requested very well done, got a barely cooked pizza. I used to love this stores pizza when they get it right, I can't eat it without rebaking it lately and actually cooking it well done. good luck, I'm out, no more orders from me. ps you guys have been trying to get us to order direct except your prices on your website are $3 more expensive than door dash. the same pizza o ordered today costs $28.50 on your website and $25.50 on door dash.
under cooked even though I asked for very well done. not even close. straight into the oven to be finished.
This place forgets my dipping sauces almost every time I order from here, is it so hard to check your list before handing it to the dasher? I paid extra for these items too
